Material Design Lite plugin

Material Design Lite is a JavaScript framework by Google let’s you add a “material design” look to your websites.

Kweb includes a fairly comprehensive plugin for MDL, supporting most MDL components. The plugin API is designed to mirror the library API.

See here for a usage example.

The MDL plugin’s implementation can be seen here.

Asynchronous usage

This demo illustrates Kweb’s powerful asynchronous features and how Kotlin’s future {} construct can be used efficiently.

Select 2 plugin

select2 is a JavaScript library that gives you a customizable select box to support for searching, tagging, remote data sets, infinite scrolling, and many other highly used options.

See this demo for a usage example.

See here for the implementation of the select2 plugin.

Others

See other demos of Kweb’s capabilities here.
